column5: 1. Read the opinions of four people about their friends.AlexTim doesn't forget to organize parties for my birthdays.FredI don't like spending time with Joe.JillI don't trust Betty, so I don't share my secrets with her.SallyAshley doesn't support me when I need her.According to the information above, who says something positive about his/her friend?

2. Clara is going to buy some books for her friends. She knows that Robert loves reading about architecture. Lisa reads magazines about water sports. Mary usually buys books on health and Jack is interested in cooking.According to the information above, which of the following books is Clara NOT going to buy?
column7: {"A": "BEST RAFTING PLACES IN THE WORLD", "B": "MODERN BUILDINGS", "C": "SECRET HISTORY OF THE TELEPHONE", "D": "DISEASES FROM PAST TO THE FUTURE"}

column5: In an English lesson, the teacher asks the students to put the words into two groups. Group 1 is about cooking methods and Group 2 is about kitchen tools. Group 1: Cooking Methods Bake Bowl Fry Group 2: Kitchen Tools Boil Pan Teaspoon According to the information above, which two words should change places to be in the correct group?
SCHOOL RULES Keep your classroom tidy. Be quiet while your teacher is talking. Return the books to the library. Which of the following does NOT fill in the blank above?
column7: {"A": "Don't talk to each other during the lessons", "B": "Don't be noisy in the school library", "C": "Come to school on time", "D": "Help your parents with the chores"}
